message: Let's start with a simple fair offer. I get $6000, you get $4000.
Your turn! How about a slightly better deal for me this time?
Time is running out and inflation is eating our money.  I'll take a slight hit from my first offer, but this is the best I can do.
Okay, let's stop wasting time.  50/50 is the fairest and we both lose out if this fails.
